snippet: The Coda certainly has its shortcomings, like old styling and having no cruise control, but it also has an impressive range of about 100 miles. It is the first made-in-China passenger car to meet federal highway safety standards.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of the 2012 Coda electric sedan.
lead_paragraph: The Coda certainly has its shortcomings, like old styling and having no cruise control, but it also has an impressive range of about 100 miles. It is the first made-in-China passenger car to meet federal highway safety standards.

headline.seo: A Bare-Bones Electric Car That Goes the Extra Mile
headline.main: A Bare-Bones Electric Car That Goes the Extra Miles
headline.print_headline: A Bare-Bones Electric Car That Goes the Extra Miles
